= Shell =


== echo ==
-n: do not output the trailing newline

== script ==
set -v on/off

== read ==
`read -p "xxx" -e var`

== date ==
vardate=`date +%Y-%m-%d`
vartime=`date +%H:%M:%S`

ll | wc -l

== String ==

{{{class="brush: shell"
${string:5:3} # from position 5, get 3
${string/substring/replacement} # 替换第一个匹配
${f/ /\\ }
${string//substring/replacement} # 替换所有匹配
${#string} # $string的长度
}}}

== IF ==
{{{class="brush: shell"
if [ 5 -gt 4 ]
then
fi

(( 5 > 4 ))

[ xxx -a xxx ] [[ xxx && xxx ]]
[ xxx -o xxx ] [[ xxx || xxx ]]
[ ! xxx ] ===> [[ ! ]]

-z string # 空?
-n string # 非空?
string1 == string2
string1 != string2
}}}

== for ==
{{{class="brush: shell"
for ((x=0;x<5;x++))
do
done
}}}
}}}
